definitions.definition: A person who is poorly educated and engages in hooliganism , petty criminality or loutish behaviour. This usage sometimes carries the connotation of youth.

main_definition: ( Scotland , Geordie , Mackem , Teesside ) A man .
secondary_definitions: ( Scotland , especially Dundee , derogatory ) A person who is poorly educated and engages in hooliganism , petty criminality or loutish behaviour. This usage sometimes carries the connotation of youth.
